title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 20
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

While Roglič continued to prove himself as the strongest in the race, there was a shake-up in the podium positions behind him. Egan Bernal fell down one spot and lost the white jersey, while Miguel Angel Lopez missed the crucial move including the GC favourites and abandoned the stage, losing his third place on GC. Strong rides from Mader and Haig saw them move up the overall standings.
